channel.title: Last two hours of the Quietus Kickstarter!
channel.description: We're in the very final hours of the Kickstarter for Quietus, a Forged in the Dark oneshot game inspired by tragic horror like Oculus, The Strangers and The Haunting of Hill House. Come join us! All stretch goals unlocked! https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/sinisterbeard/quietus-a-roleplaying-game-of-melancholy-horror

item.title: Last two hours of the Quietus Kickstarter!
